about_the_game:
Welcome to the development team of "Netherworld Covenant"! We are two developers with extensive experience in game development, responsible for art and programming, respectively. After a period of development, we decided to commit full-time to focus on realizing our dream. Although our team is small, "The Pact of the Underworld" is our first full-time project creating our own game, embodying all our experience and passion.

Despite not having a stable income, we believe that with persistence and creativity, we can turn this dream into reality. Thank you for your support, and we hope to see your thoughts and suggestions. We look forward to sharing more development progress with you!

Netherworld Covenant is an action roguelike game currently under development, where players utilize the souls of fallen comrades and dimensional traversal to conquer formidable adversaries. In the game, players will engage in battles alongside a variety of empowered spirits, deftly evading attacks while seeking opportunities to strike down foes that stand in their path.

The Ethereal Torch, an extraordinary sacred artifact that bridges the realm of the ethereal and the mortal realm, its profound energy can only be awakened by the depths of the user's soul, releasing the radiant flame of the soul. When a brave soul ignites this Soul Torch with their steadfast heart, it not only illuminates their path in the spirit realm but also bestows upon them the miraculous power to guide the departed beyond dimensional boundaries, back to the mortal world. Beneath the fervent blaze of this torch, those wandering lost souls find temporary refuge in the earthly realm, fulfilling the unfulfilled promises they couldn't in life.

The protagonist, who survived the loss of their comrades, will face what fate has in store for them next.

The player possesses skills such as combo attacks, parry, dodge, and dimensional traversal. They skillfully employ these abilities to defeat powerful enemies.

The soul companions system is a vital feature in the game, setting it apart from other action games. Each soul companion offers unique abilities, and players can traverse between these souls, enhancing strategic depth and gameplay variety.

Currently, there are four departed friends who can help us, each possessing diverse abilities to choose from, with distinct combat styles.

In the subsequent development, we will introduce additional characters to join our ranks, offering even more diversity in abilities and combat styles.

You will face a variety of monsters influenced by malevolent spiritual energy. Some were once noble lords, formidable knights, while others were inherently evil demons.

The camp, situated at the boundary between the ethereal and the mortal realm, offers the protagonist temporary respite and shelter. Here, we gather the souls of former comrades, accumulate resources, and enhance abilities in preparation for the final vengeance.

content_descriptors.notes: There will be frequent bloody battle scenes in the game.

  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better
